isis.stitle: CAB: 2000, 4000, AND 8000 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - ELECTRIC WINDOW SWITCHES

svcsubproc.title: Door Mounted Electric Window Switches (Before December 5, 1994)
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 17for Items in parentheses.

svcsubproc.title: Remove
svcsubproc.para: Lift power window switch panel (Item 1) from door trim panel (Item 4). Unplug harness connectors (Item 2) from switch panel. Remove switch panel from door trim panel.

svcsubproc.title: Install
svcsubproc.para: Position power window switch panel (Item 1) at door trim panel (Item 4). Plug wiring harness connectors (Item 2) into switch panel. Push switch panel into door trim panel.

svcsubproc.title: Instrument Panel Mounted Electric Window Switches (After December 5, 1994)
svcsubproc.para: Power window switches are mounted on the instrument panel (after December 5, 1994). Two switches are mounted just left of the steering wheel: one switch operates the driver's window and the other operates the passenger's window. One switch is located on the right side (passenger's side) of the instrument panel just below the air vent.
